meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)
Knowing too much is a disease, Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise, Ignorance is the peace of life
Knowing too much is a disease, Where ignorance is bliss, it is folly to be wise, Ignorance is the peace of life
in the manner of one being unaware of something, unwittingly
It is not of one's concern

vlive.english: I say, "I said it's all right".

examples.korean: The older generation, Lee said, appreciated fine Korean paintings and porcelain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기성세대들은 훌륭한 한국 회화와 도자기의 진가를 알았다고 이 교수는 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: The older generation, Lee said, appreciated fine Korean paintings and porcelain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lee said that after the first 100 meters, he knew he could win the race. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이강석은 첫 100미터를 통과한 후에 자신이 이 경기를 이길 수 있다는 것을 알았다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Lee said that after the first 100 meters, he knew he could win the race. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was certain that he had inferred the supervisor's true wishes from the tone of her memo. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 책임자의 메모 어투에서 그녀가 정말 원하는 것이 알았다고 뭔지를 확신했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was certain that he had inferred the supervisor's true wishes from the tone of her memo. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Min explained that he thought the blanket was free. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 민 씨는 그 담요가 무료인 줄 알았다고 설명했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Min explained that he thought the blanket was free. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: According to baseball officials, Kim realized his passport had been lost shortly before he was to fly to Hawaii. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 야구 관계자들에 따르면, 김병헌은 그가 하와이 행 비행기에 타기 바로 직전에 여권을 잃어버린 것을 알았다고 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: According to baseball officials, Kim realized his passport had been lost shortly before he was to fly to Hawaii. Add to Wordbook
